attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We can stop gun and knife crime but we need to do certain actions in order to stop this, such as :
Making the jail sentence for those who commit gun and knife crime, life.
To make sure when gangs are stopped and searched all members are (even girls as often they will be carrying the weapon for their boyfriend)
To have more gun and knife crime drop in bins.
And other similar ideas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
